name: Bubble Blast Rescue VR
description:
Help save the Bubble Blast from horrible enemies who are keeping them hostage on remote islands !

Your job will be to throw Bubble Blast at enemies and push them into the surroundings water. Be aware that the enemies are smart and have protected themselves in such a way you could lose Bubble Blast friends if you are not careful enough.

The game requires skills to achieve a perfect score.

Come play Bubble Blast Rescue today. Hours of fun ahead of you !

- 450 levels
- VR game
